    B

    Beamer - Class in Unnamed Package
    Class Beamer - Represents a teleportation device in the game.
    Beamer(String, String, double) - Constructor for class Beamer
    Constructs a new unloaded Beamer with all the attributes of its super class, .

    C

    charge(Room) - Method in class Beamer
    Charges the beamer with the given room.
    chargeBeamer(String) - Method in class Player
    Charges the beamer in the player's inventory with the current room, if the player is carrying it.
    Command - Class in Unnamed Package
    Class Command - Represents a command issued by the player in the game.
    Command(String, String) - Constructor for class Command
    Constructor that creates a Command object with a command word and an optional second word.
    CommandWords - Class in Unnamed Package
    Class CommandWords - Holds an enumeration table of all command words known to the game.
    CommandWords() - Constructor for class CommandWords
    Constructor - initialise the command words.

    D

    drop(String) - Method in class Player
    Drops an item from the player's inventory into the current room.

    E

    eat(String) - Method in class Player
    Allows the player to eat an item, modifying the player's attributes based on the item.
    enable(boolean) - Method in class UserInterface
    Enable or disable input in the entry field.

    F

    fire() - Method in class Beamer
    Fires the beamer, returning the charged room.
    fireBeamer(String) - Method in class Player
    Fires the beamer in the player's inventory to teleport them to the charged room, if the player is carrying it.

    G

    Game - Class in Unnamed Package
    Class Game - Main class, creates the necessary implementation objects and starts the game off.
    Game() - Constructor for class Game
    Create the game and initialise its internal map.
    GameEngine - Class in Unnamed Package
    Class GameEngine - Creates all rooms, creates the parser and starts the game.
    GameEngine() - Constructor for class GameEngine
    Constructor for objects of class GameEngine
    getCommand(String) - Method in class Parser
    Get a new command from the user.
    getCommandList() - Method in class CommandWords
    Prints all valid commands to System.out.
    getCommandString() - Method in class Parser
    Returns a String with valid command words.
    getCommandWord() - Method in class Command
    Gets the main command word.
    getCurrentRoom() - Method in class Player
    Gets the current room the player is in.
    getDescription() - Method in class Item
    Gets the description of the item.
    getDescription() - Method in class Room
    Gets the description of the room.
    getExit(String) - Method in class Room
    Gets the room in the specified direction if it exists.
    getExitString() - Method in class Room
    Creates a keySet of all the exits from the current room, then constructs a string of it.
    getImageName() - Method in class Room
    Returns the name of the Room's image.
    getInvString() - Method in class Player
    Returns a string representation of the player's inventory.
    getInvWeight() - Method in class Player
    Gets the total weight of the items in the player's inventory.
    getItem(String) - Method in class ItemList
    Returns the item having the specified name.
    getItem(String) - Method in class Room
    Returns the item having the specified name.
    getItemString() - Method in class Item
    Returns a detailed string description of the item, including its weight.
    getItemString() - Method in class ItemList
    Creates a keySet of all the Items in the list, then constructs a string of it.
    getItemString() - Method in class Room
    Creates a keySet of all the Items in the current room, then constructs a string of it.
    getLongDescription() - Method in class Room
    Returns a description of the current room, of the form : You are in the Control Room.
    getName() - Method in class Item
    Gets the name of the item.
    getPlayerName() - Method in class Player
    Gets the player's name.
    getSecondWord() - Method in class Command
    Gets the secondary word if available.
    getTotalWeight() - Method in class ItemList
    Returns the total weight of all the items in the list.
    getWeight() - Method in class Item
    Gets the weight of the item.
    goBack() - Method in class Player
    Moves the player back to the previous room (if it's accessible) using the "visited rooms" history.
    goRoom(Room) - Method in class Player
    Moves the player to a new room and adds the current room to the "visited rooms" history.

    H

    hasSecondWord() - Method in class Command
    Checks if the command includes a secondary word.

    I

    interpretCommand(String) - Method in class GameEngine
    Given a command, process (that is: execute) the command.
    isCharged() - Method in class Beamer
    Checks if the beamer is charged.
    isCommand(String) - Method in class CommandWords
    Check whether a given String is a valid command word.
    isExit(Room) - Method in class Room
    Checks if the given room is one of the exits of this room.
    isUnknown() - Method in class Command
    Checks if the command is unknown (if it has no main command word).
    Item - Class in Unnamed Package
    Class Item - Represents an object that can be placed in a Room.
    Item(String, String, double) - Constructor for class Item
    Constructs a new Item with the specified name, description, and weight.
    ItemList - Class in Unnamed Package
    Class ItemList - Represents a collection of items.
    ItemList() - Constructor for class ItemList
    Constructs an empty item list.

    P

    Parser - Class in Unnamed Package
    Class Parser - Takes user input and tries to interpret it as a "Zuul" command.
    Parser() - Constructor for class Parser
    Create a new Parser.
    Player - Class in Unnamed Package
    The Player class represents a player in the game.
    Player(String, Room) - Constructor for class Player
    Constructs a new player with a name and starting room.
    print(String) - Method in class UserInterface
    Print out some text into the text area.
    println(String) - Method in class UserInterface
    Print out some text into the text area, followed by a line break.

    R

    removeItem(String) - Method in class ItemList
    Remove the specified Item from the list
    removeItem(String) - Method in class Room
    Remove the specified Item from the room
    Room - Class in Unnamed Package
    Class Room - Represents a location in the game.
    Room(String, String) - Constructor for class Room
    Constructor to initialize the room with a description, an image, and two HashMaps with its exits and Items.

    S

    setExits(String, Room) - Method in class Room
    Sets an exit for the specified direction to a neighboring room.

    setGUI(UserInterface) - Method in class Player
    Sets the game graphical user interface.
    showImage(String) - Method in class UserInterface
    Show an image file in the interface.

    T

    take(String) - Method in class Player
    Allows the player to pick up an item from the current room and add it to their inventory.

    U

    updateDescription(String) - Method in class Room
    Sets a new description for the room.
    use(String) - Method in class GameEngine
    When called, the player uses the specified item.
    use(String) - Method in class Player
    When called, the player uses the specified item.
    UserInterface - Class in Unnamed Package
    Class UserInterface - Implements a simple graphical user interface with a text entry area, a text output area and an optional image.

    Construct a UserInterface.
